attributes.additional_details: Pensions are for your financial well being in retirement. I have a pension at the moment with the police a good one. I also have an old frozen/paid up/wound up one from my time working in logistics. As long as you have a current pension running for your future well being, should you not be allowed to surrender any other frozen pensions in your own names and receive it as a lump sum paying the tax owed on it?? its our money, it should be our choice when we should receive it.
